{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-803 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00HGLOTSK;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/26/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-AC08 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR803A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR803A1 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8881AQ |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8881AQ |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui=C0:A0:BB |oui_eth=C0:A0:BB }} ''Wireless AC760 Dual Band Router''
{{ProductPage|http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dir-803-wireless-ac750-dual-band-router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-803}} "8WRGAC08.1A1G" ( + PCB manuf. text and '''1325''' date code) is silkscreened on the bottom of the board in the FCC photos. "WRGAC08" is silkscreened on the top of the board. :The '''Realtek''' 11ac WiSoC used would appear to be RTL8881AQ. Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :Default SSID formats may be '''dlink-XXXX''' and '''dlink-XXXX-5GHz'''. The sample label PDF shows a device with a C0:A0:BB ('''D-Link Intnl.''') OUI. It is presumed to be used (for at least some devices). The two power adapters shown in the FCC external photos are... *a '''GLOBAL YEOU DIANN ELECTRIC INDUSTRIAL CO., LTD.''' AMS47-0501000FU (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.2A/15VA -> 5VDC, 1A) *a '''Shenzhen Frecom Electronics Co., Ltd.''' F05W-050100SPAU (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 190mA -> 5VDC, 1A) {{WiFiCert|WFA50127|10/09/2013}}
